metadata.title: CVE-2017-0445 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the HTC touchscreen driver couldenable a local malicious application to execute arbitrary code within thecontext of the kernel. This issue is rated as High because it firstrequires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android. Versions:Kernel-3.18. Android ID: A-32769717.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
